title: An unexpected error has occurred while logging in
body: So, i was able to play league just fine 2 days ago, and since yesterday I can't login. An unexpected error has occurred pops up and I checked everything on the support page to see if it helps but everything is fine so I really don't know what's the problem, it doesn't work on the new or the old client, can someone help me please.

replies.body:
Same happened here, worked fine like 2 hours ago but now I can't log on. Tried everything said on this post but nothing has worked for me


{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Hey there, a quick fix is to just switch to a different region and then switch back :D worked like a charm for me.
Maybe i shouldnt have switched to japan xD
didn't work for me :'({{item:3070}}
Worked for me, Thanks a lot!
Actually worked for me :D thanks man.

Since this new client came in run I have been put in low priority thousand times because i cudnot reconnect due to this unexpected error. Downloaded the game again more than 10 times, hextech repair tool, follow instructions, reports etc etc. Still facing unexpected error each and every time i try to log in. Now i always expect this unexpected error. Riot doesnt even care. Its been2 months now

Change region in the login screen a couple of times!
That fixed it for me.

i know how to fix this error. it works for me. 
go to https://www.hotspotshield.com/ and download it and it will fix this error.
Share this with to help more players!
How does downloading that fix my login problems?

Btw hotspot is working together with NSA and FBI. Inform yourself if you dont trust me and look up who the managers of this company are and for whom theyve been working the past years.

Back to the topic: I still have this issue and cant fix it lol.
omg i literally was having this problem for 2 weeks and i was really disappointed because i want to play so bad and then i find this and it works for me thankyou <3!!
You my Good sir are a legend, been siting here for 2hrs till i found this, bless you.
thanks dude it worked :D

I love you so much!!!! THANK YOU!!! 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Ty bro, it worked !!!! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
love u bro <3{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
thx
You are a freaking champ mate. Even now after a day of searching you were the one that fixxed it <3 <3 . Cheers{{item:3052}}
I've tried reinstalling and using the hextech repair tool today and yesterday and nothing helped...I have no idea what could be the issue. It was working fine 3 days ago....
This stupid error guys its happening to me like for 12 days and idk how to fix please some1 leave me solution , i wanna play lol -.-

*League of Shit* i GET THIS MESSEGE everyday saying "an unexpected error has occurred " what does this mean?! i tried everything that ppl suggest and nothing works PLS PLS help me as soon as possible {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Having the same problem since this new client bullshit came out. can u stop being lazy riot. theres clearly alot of people who have the same issue. they cant even login on ur fking dumbass client. yes we have tried everythign ur bullshit support tech said and yes we are all still looking untill u fix ur shit. seems like its been over a month now considering the date of these posts and still no fix seems like ur just ignoring the problem at this point. LAZY.
I have been put in low priority many time because of unable to reconnect
Same problem. Have been 3 days already. What can I do?
Same here.

Well i can tell you what riot support told me to check and everything although mu LoL fixed on it's own yesterday when the new patch came out. You can try connecting to your LoL client through an VPN since maybe your router is blocking some ports wichs the game needs.
Okay, obviously this is still a major issue. I'm trying to play with some friends and it wont let me long in.
Worked for me too. I tried couple of times with different regions.

I had the same problem, I fixed it by going into my modem settings and changing the setting SPI Firewall Protection: ( High > Low) strangely enough I never had any problems with this setting, before I always had it set on High. yesterday I was still able to play with this on High. but w/e

I just reset password and got it to work fine. Also tried the Region switch.

It seems that the 'unexpected error' displays if you are getting your password wrong.
I didnt get a Mail on my Email Adress... =( Cant send a Link for a new Password

Idk if anyone noticed, but this error is somehow account-related. I can log in fine into some accounts, and get this error at some other accs. Restarting the client, changing server, reinstalling and repairing does not help.
This happens in case of about 15% of the accs I have access to ( the number of accs is over 100 ).

I HAVE FOUND THE ISSUE:
Its caps sensitive. my password doesnt have a capital letter at the start, and everytime I enter my password with the first letter with a capital, I get the error. This is an easy mistake to make since you cannot see what you are typing.

Give this a go and let me know if this was the issue for you!
I found a solution: type a password in text editor and copy/paste it  in same input in launcher

Since riot has yet to help any of you, if you guys are still having this issue try resetting password. I did everything listed in this thread and that was the only thing that worked for me best of luck getting rid of the error guys

I think I know somethin

go to ur browser
type ur ip 
and then reboot ur roter
and then It will work 
it worked for me :D
an unexpected error occurred while logging in. please try again. if this issue persists contact support at  thats my problem solve it pls

SOLVED NO EXTRA PROGRAMS!!!! Go to your router settings. ( check you ip. in cmd type /ipconfig
search for the ipv4 number then type that into your browser username and password are both admin admin) then you search for something like Set Factory Defaults what completely resets your router settings (not reboot!!!) there you go
Needed this solution coz hotspot goes wild sometimes and makes you unable to join certain teamspeak servers and ever slow internet speed down after the trial versionis over
After i stop the program the game kicks me out. wow
ty bro u're the best +1 rep.
Experiencing same issues as well
Worked for me: Just right click League of legends launcher and then click Troubleshoot Compatibility, select Try Recommended settings, Test the program, Then next and save the new settings
same here i cant log in into my account because of the same problem
